createUsageReport.description: Generate a comprehensive report of account usage and quotas including storage, bandwidth, transformations, requests, and add-on usage.

props.name: date
props.description: Date for the usage report. Must be within the last 3 months. Leave empty for current date.

props.name: include_breakdown
props.description: Whether to include detailed breakdown of transformation types and add-on usage in the response.

deleteResource.description: Permanently delete images, videos, or files from Cloudinary.

props.name: deletion_mode
props.description: Choose how to specify assets for deletion

props.name: public_ids_manual
props.description: Or type comma-separated public IDs manually (up to 100). Example: image1,image2,folder/image3

props.name: tag_manual
props.description: Or type tag name manually to delete all assets with this tag (up to 1000 assets)

props.name: prefix
props.description: Delete all assets whose public ID starts with this prefix (up to 1000 assets)

props.name: type
props.description: The delivery type of assets to delete

props.name: keep_original
props.description: Delete only derived assets, keep the original

props.name: invalidate
props.description: Whether to invalidate CDN cached copies. Takes a few minutes to propagate.

findResourceByPublicId.description: Retrieve details of an asset using its unique public ID.

props.name: public_id_manual
props.description: Or enter the public ID manually if not found in dropdown (e.g., "sample", "folder/image-name")

props.name: delivery_type
props.description: The delivery type of the asset

transformResource.description: Apply transformations (resize, crop, watermark, etc.) to an asset and generate a new URL.

props.name: public_id_manual
props.description: Or enter public ID manually if not in dropdown

props.name: width
props.description: Target width in pixels

props.name: height
props.description: Target height in pixels

props.name: crop_mode
props.description: How to handle resizing when aspect ratios differ

props.name: gravity
props.description: Which part to focus on when cropping

props.name: format
props.description: Convert to this format

props.name: quality
props.description: Image quality/compression level

props.name: border
props.description: Add border (e.g., "5px_solid_blue", "10px_solid_#ff0000")

props.name: radius
props.description: Round corners or make circular

props.name: opacity
props.description: Transparency level (0-100, where 100 is opaque)

props.name: rotation
props.description: Rotate image by degrees (0-360)

props.name: raw_transformation
props.description: Advanced: Raw transformation string (e.g., "c_fill,w_300,h_200/e_sepia/r_20"). This will be applied after the above basic transformations.

props.name: generate_url_only
props.description: If true, only return the transformation URL. If false, also make a request to generate the transformed asset.

uploadResource.description: Upload a new image, video, or file to Cloudinary.

props.name: file
props.description: The file to upload to Cloudinary.

props.name: public_id
props.description: The public ID for the uploaded resource. If not specified, a random ID will be generated.

props.name: folder
props.description: Select an existing folder or type a new folder path (e.g., "samples/animals")

props.name: tags
props.description: Select existing tags or type new ones

props.name: overwrite
props.description: Whether to overwrite existing assets with the same public ID.

props.name: use_filename
props.description: Whether to use the original file name as the public ID.

new_resource.description: The Cloudinary folder to watch for new resources. Leave empty to watch the entire account.

props.name: asset_folder
props.description: The Cloudinary folder to watch for new resources. Leave empty to watch the entire account.

new_tag_added_to_asset.description: The type of resources to monitor for tag changes

props.name: resource_type
props.description: The type of resources to monitor for tag changes

props.name: asset_folder
props.description: Optional: Watch only assets in this specific folder. Leave empty to watch all assets.
